definitions.definition: The evergreen shrub Juniperus sabina , endemic to Europe , which yields a medicinal oil .
The poisonous dried tips of this plant, with anthelmintic properties, used as a drug.
The eastern red cedar , Juniperus virginiana , of eastern North America.

main_definition: The evergreen shrub Juniperus sabina , endemic to Europe , which yields a medicinal oil .
secondary_definitions: The poisonous dried tips of this plant, with anthelmintic properties, used as a drug.
